title: The Easter Story
description: Richly illustrated by Candle Bible for Kids artist Jo Parry, The Easter Story helps children discover one of the most important stories of all time. Through clear, approachable text, children come to understand the events leading up to Jesus' death and the astonishing miracle of His resurrection. Introduces children to the reason we celebrate this special day, and shares with them the wonderful gift of God's Good News.
author: Juliet David
